mapper.select: SELECT s.STU_NO , d.DEPT_NAME , s.STU_NAME , s.STU_PHONE , ss.R_STATUS , s.STU_GRADE , s.STU_BK_NUM , s.STU_JUMIN, s.STU_EMAIL, s.STU_ADMISSION, s.STU_ADDRESS, s.STU_ADMISSION_DATE , COALESCE(sch.SCH_DISCOUNT, '없음') FROM university.STUDENT s JOIN university.DEPARTMENT d ON s.DEPT_CODE = d.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN university.STUDENT_STATUS ss ON s.STU_NO = ss.STU_NO AND ss.YEAR = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND ss.SMT = MONTH(CURDATE()) DIV 6 + 1 LEFT JOIN university.SCHOLARLIST sl ON s.STU_NO = sl.STU_NO LEFT JOIN university.SCHOLARSHIP sch ON sl.SCH_NO = sch.SCH_NO WHERE s.STU_NO = '${loginNo}'
